name: Computer Science
description: Study computer systems and programming languages to develop software applications and solve complex problems.
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of programming and mathematics is recommended.

name: Hospitality Management & Technology
description: Learn the management principles and explore the technological advancements in the hospitality industry to provide exceptional guest experiences.
prerequisites: No prerequisites required. Open to all interested learners.

name: Accounting
description: Gain a strong foundation in financial reporting, analysis, and taxation to effectively manage the financial aspects of businesses and organizations.
prerequisites: No prerequisites required. Open to all interested learners.

name: Office Technology Management
description: Develop administrative and technology skills to efficiently manage office operations and implement digital tools for enhanced productivity.
prerequisites: No prerequisites required. Open to all interested learners.

name: Mass Communication
description: Explore various forms of media, including journalism, advertising, and public relations, to effectively communicate messages to diverse audiences.
prerequisites: No prerequisites required. Open to all interested learners.

name: Marketing
description: Learn marketing strategies, consumer behavior, and market research techniques to create impactful campaigns and drive business growth.
prerequisites: No prerequisites required. Open to all interested learners.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Study the design and construction of infrastructure projects such as bridges, buildings, and transportation systems to shape the world we live in.
prerequisites: Strong foundation in mathematics and physics is recommended.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Explore the principles of mechanical systems, including thermodynamics and materials science, to design and develop innovative machines and devices.
prerequisites: Strong foundation in mathematics and physics is recommended.

name: Electrical Engineering
description: Learn about electrical circuits, power systems, and electronics to design and develop technologies that power our modern world.
prerequisites: Strong foundation in mathematics and physics is recommended.

name: Mathematics
description: Study mathematical concepts and problem-solving techniques to analyze patterns, make predictions, and provide solutions in various fields.
prerequisites: No prerequisites required. Open to all interested learners.

name: Statistics
description: Explore statistical methods and data analysis techniques to make informed decisions and draw meaningful insights from data.
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of mathematics is recommended.

name: Computer Engineering
description: Integrate computer science and electrical engineering principles to design and develop computer hardware and software systems.
prerequisites: Strong foundation in mathematics and physics is recommended.
